sentences.sContent: The new ball gown was a great success.
sentences.sCn: 那件新款长礼服非常成功。

sentences.sContent: ...it was a loose gown worn by females of the royal family...

synos.tran: 长袍，长外衣；礼服；睡袍；法衣

remMethod.val: 灰姑娘脱下(down)礼服(gown)和玻璃鞋， 逃离了王子的视线

trans.tranOther: a long loose piece of clothing worn for special ceremonies by judges, teachers, lawyers, and members of universities
